Integration Process: Student submits registration form with valid credentials and ID images
Pre-condition: Database is accessible, Email service is configured
Expected Outcome: Student record created in database, verification email sent to student's email address, email verification token generated and stored
Remarks: Verify email contains correct verification link and token

Integration Process: Student submits registration form with ID images
Pre-condition: Database is accessible, Password service is initialized
Expected Outcome: Password is hashed using PBKDF2 algorithm before storing in database, hashed password is stored securely
Remarks: Verify password cannot be retrieved in plain text

Integration Process: Student submits registration form with ID images
Pre-condition: Database is accessible, ID validation service is configured
Expected Outcome: ID number is validated, ID images are processed and validated, validation results stored
Remarks: Verify invalid ID formats are rejected

Integration Process: Student submits registration form with ID images
Pre-condition: File storage service is configured (Local or S3)
Expected Outcome: ID front and back images are uploaded and saved, file paths stored in database, file size and type validation performed
Remarks: Verify files are accessible after upload

Pre-condition: Database is accessible, UserType table exists
Expected Outcome: UserType record created first, Student record created with foreign key to UserType, transaction ensures atomicity
Remarks: Verify rollback occurs if any step fails

Pre-condition: Student is logged in and verified, Schedule exists with available slots
Expected Outcome: Schedule availability is checked, schedule status updated to "No" if booked, appointment created with correct schedule reference
Remarks: Verify concurrent bookings are handled correctly

Pre-condition: Appointment is successfully created, Email service is configured
Expected Outcome: Confirmation email sent to student with appointment details (date, time, appointment ID)
Remarks: Verify email contains all appointment information

Pre-condition: Appointment is successfully created, Queue service is running
Expected Outcome: Queue number assigned based on appointment date and existing appointments, queue status set to "Waiting"
Remarks: Verify queue numbers are sequential and unique per day

Pre-condition: Database is accessible, Student and Schedule records exist
Expected Outcome: Appointment record created with foreign keys to Student and Schedule, Schedule.IsAvailable updated to "No"
Remarks: Verify data consistency between tables

Integration Process: Student attempts to book appointment within 5 minutes of slot time
Pre-condition: Current time is within 5 minutes of appointment slot
Expected Outcome: Booking is rejected with appropriate error message, appointment is not created
Remarks: Verify time zone handling (Philippine Time)

Integration Process: Clinic staff updates appointment status to ""Confirmed""
Pre-condition: Appointment exists, Clinic staff is logged in
Expected Outcome: Notification created and stored in database, notification visible to student
Remarks: Verify notification is linked to correct student

Pre-condition: Appointment exists, Email service is configured
Expected Outcome: Status change email sent to student (e.g., confirmation, cancellation, completion)
Remarks: Verify email content matches appointment status

Pre-condition: Appointment exists, Queue service is running
Expected Outcome: Queue status updated based on appointment status (Waiting, Being Served, Completed, Cancelled)
Remarks: Verify queue status reflects appointment status accurately

Integration Process: Clinic staff updates appointment status to ""In Progress""
Pre-condition: Appointment exists in "Confirmed" status
Expected Outcome: Appointment status updated to "In Progress", queue status updated to "Being Served", changes persisted
Remarks: Verify status transitions follow business rules

Pre-condition: Appointment exists in active status, Email service is configured
Expected Outcome: Cancellation email sent to student with cancellation reason, appointment status updated to "Cancelled"
Remarks: Verify cancellation reason is included in email

Pre-condition: Appointment exists, Schedule is linked
Expected Outcome: Schedule availability updated back to "Yes" if applicable, appointment status updated to "Cancelled"
Remarks: Verify schedule is released for re-booking

Integration Process: Clinic staff creates new schedule slots
Pre-condition: Clinic staff is logged in, Database is accessible
Expected Outcome: Schedule records created for specified date range, IsAvailable set to "Yes" by default
Remarks: Verify bulk schedule creation works correctly

Pre-condition: Schedule exists, Appointments may be linked
Expected Outcome: Schedule availability updated, existing appointments remain valid, new bookings respect updated availability
Remarks: Verify existing appointments are not affected

Pre-condition: Database is empty or Usertypes table is empty
Expected Outcome: Default user types created, admin clinic staff created, 30 days of schedules created (excluding weekends)
Remarks: Verify schedules are created only for weekdays

Integration Process: Student sends message to clinic staff
Pre-condition: Student and clinic staff are logged in, SignalR connection established
Expected Outcome: Message saved to database, real-time message delivered via SignalR to clinic staff, message appears in both users' message lists
Remarks: Verify real-time delivery works without page refresh

Integration Process: Clinic staff sends message to student
Pre-condition: Clinic staff is logged in, Student exists
Expected Outcome: Message record created with sender and receiver references, message stored with timestamp
Remarks: Verify message ordering by timestamp

Integration Process: System creates notification for appointment status change
Pre-condition: Notification is created, Email service is configured
Expected Outcome: Notification stored in database, email notification sent to student (if configured)
Remarks: Verify notification and email are synchronized

Pre-condition: Clinic staff is logged in, Student exists
Expected Outcome: Notification record created with correct patient reference, notification visible in student's notification list
Remarks: Verify notification is marked as unread initially

Integration Process: Clinic staff creates patient record for appointment
Pre-condition: Appointment exists, Clinic staff is logged in
Expected Outcome: Patient record (Precord) created and linked to appointment, vital signs and medical information stored
Remarks: Verify record is accessible from appointment details

Pre-condition: Patient record exists, Appointment is linked
Expected Outcome: Patient record updated, changes persisted, record remains linked to appointment
Remarks: Verify historical records are preserved

Pre-condition: Appointments exist for today, Queue service is running
Expected Outcome: Queue numbers assigned automatically based on appointment time and priority, queue status updated
Remarks: Verify queue numbers are assigned in correct order

Pre-condition: Appointment with "Priority" level exists
Expected Outcome: Priority appointment placed immediately next in queue, queue numbers of other appointments adjusted if needed
Remarks: Verify priority appointments are handled correctly

Pre-condition: Student account exists and is active
Expected Outcome: Password is verified against hashed password in database, session created upon successful authentication
Remarks: Verify password comparison uses secure hashing

Pre-condition: Student record exists with valid UserType
Expected Outcome: Student session data stored, user role retrieved from UserType, access permissions applied
Remarks: Verify role-based access control works

Pre-condition: Student account exists with verification token
Expected Outcome: Token validated, email verification status updated, account activation status checked
Remarks: Verify expired tokens are rejected

Pre-condition: Student account exists with unverified email
Expected Outcome: IsEmailVerified flag updated to true, verification token cleared or marked as used
Remarks: Verify one-time use of verification tokens

Pre-condition: Clinic staff is logged in, Current date/time available
Expected Outcome: New schedule slot created if needed, schedule marked as unavailable, appointment created with walk-in flag
Remarks: Verify walk-in appointments don't conflict with existing schedules

Pre-condition: Walk-in appointment created, Queue service is running
Expected Outcome: Queue number assigned immediately, queue status set appropriately, appointment appears in today's queue
Remarks: Verify walk-in appointments are prioritized correctly

Pre-condition: File storage configured for local storage
Expected Outcome: File saved to local file system, file path stored in database, file accessible via URL
Remarks: Verify file permissions and accessibility

Pre-condition: File storage configured for AWS S3
Expected Outcome: File uploaded to S3 bucket, S3 URL stored in database, file accessible via S3 URL
Remarks: Verify S3 credentials and bucket permissions

Pre-condition: Database is accessible, Usertypes table is empty
Expected Outcome: Default user types created (Admin, ClinicStaff, Student), admin clinic staff account created with hashed password, initial schedules created
Remarks: Verify seeding is idempotent (doesn't duplicate on restart)

Pre-condition: Data seeding service is initialized
Expected Outcome: Admin password hashed before storing, password service used for secure password creation
Remarks: Verify admin can log in with seeded credentials

Pre-condition: User is logged in, Session middleware is configured
Expected Outcome: Session data stored, session cookie created, session persists across requests
Remarks: Verify session timeout works correctly

Pre-condition: Error occurs in any module
Expected Outcome: Error caught by middleware, appropriate error response returned, error logged for debugging
Remarks: Verify user-friendly error messages are displayed

Pre-condition: Clinic staff is logged in, Appointments exist
Expected Outcome: Dashboard displays appointment statistics, real-time appointment list, queue information
Remarks: Verify dashboard data is current and accurate

Pre-condition: Clinic staff is logged in, Notifications exist
Expected Outcome: Unread notification count displayed, recent notifications shown
Remarks: Verify notification counts are accurate

Pre-condition: Appointment exists, Student is logged in
Expected Outcome: Old schedule released (availability set to "Yes"), new schedule selected and marked unavailable, appointment updated with new schedule
Remarks: Verify schedule conflicts are prevented

Pre-condition: Appointment rescheduled successfully, Email service is configured
Expected Outcome: Rescheduling confirmation email sent to student with new appointment details
Remarks: Verify email contains both old and new appointment information

Pre-condition: Student is logged in, Appointments exist
Expected Outcome: All student's appointments retrieved, appointments sorted by date, appointment details displayed
Remarks: Verify only student's own appointments are shown

Pre-condition: Clinic staff is logged in, Patient records exist
Expected Outcome: Patient's complete medical history retrieved, records linked to appointments, history displayed chronologically
Remarks: Verify patient privacy is maintained

Integration Process: Student uploads ID images during registration
Pre-condition: ID images are uploaded, Validation service is configured
Expected Outcome: ID images processed, ID number extracted and validated, validation results stored
Remarks: Verify invalid or unreadable IDs are rejected

Pre-condition: SignalR hub is configured, Appointments exist
Expected Outcome: Queue status changes broadcast to connected clients in real-time, clients receive updates without page refresh
Remarks: Verify WebSocket connection stability

Pre-condition: SignalR hub is configured, Users are connected
Expected Outcome: Messages delivered in real-time to recipient, message appears immediately in chat interface
Remarks: Verify message delivery confirmation

Pre-condition: System is configured for Philippine timezone
Expected Outcome: All appointment times converted to Philippine time, time comparisons use correct timezone
Remarks: Verify timezone conversion is accurate

Pre-condition: Database supports transactions
Expected Outcome: UserType and Student created atomically, rollback occurs if any step fails, data consistency maintained
Remarks: Verify transaction isolation and consistency
